XIII.i.3.H.2.g
.
Notifying HAC After Discontinuing a Veteran’s P&T Disability  Rating
After promulgating a rating decision that discontinues a Veteran’s P&T disability rating, fax a copy of the decision to the HAC Eligibility Unit, using the fax number (303) 331-7809.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section H - Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs (CHAMPVA) Eligibility Determinations
